title: Gold, Silver Smash Records as End-Of-Year Rally Continues
description: Gold, silver, and platinum extended a historic end-of-year rally for precious metals, jumping to all-time highs, with spot gold peaking above $4,530 an ounce. Tatiana Darie has more on Bloomberg Television. (Source: Bloomberg)
